00012 #include "stxxl/bits/common/utils.h"
00013 
00014 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00015  #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00016  #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>
00017 #else
00018  #include <pthread.h>
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 
00022 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00023 
00024 //#define onoff_switch Switch
00025 
00026 class onoff_switch
00027 {
00028 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00029     boost::mutex mutex;
00030     boost::condition cond;
00031 #else
00032     pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00033     pthread_cond_t cond;
00034 #endif
00035     bool _on;
00036     onoff_switch(const onoff_switch & obj);
00037     onoff_switch & operator = (const onoff_switch & obj);
00038 public:
00039     onoff_switch (bool flag = false) : _on (flag)
00040     {
00041 #ifndef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00042         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_init (&mutex, NULL), resource_error);
00043         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_init (&cond, NULL), resource_error);
00044 #endif
00045     };
00046     ~onoff_switch ()
00047     {
00048 #ifndef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00049         int res = pthread_mutex_trylock (&mutex);
00050 
00051         if (res == 0 || res == EBUSY) {
00052             stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock
00053                            (&mutex), resource_error);
00054         } else
00055             stxxl_function_error(resource_error);
00056         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_destroy
00057                        (&mutex), resource_error);
00058 
00059 
00060         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_destroy (&cond), resource_error);
00061 #endif
00062     };
00063     void on ()
00064     {
00065 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00066         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00067         _on = true;
00068         Lock.unlock();
00069         cond.notify_one();
00070 #else
00071         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex), resource_error);
00072         _on = true;
00073         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex), resource_error);
00074         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_signal (&cond), resource_error);
00075 #endif
00076     }
00077     void off ()
00078     {
00079 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00080         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00081         _on = false;
00082         Lock.unlock();
00083         cond.notify_one();
00084 #else
00085         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex), resource_error);
00086         _on = false;
00087         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex), resource_error);
00088         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_signal (&cond), resource_error);
00089 #endif
00090     }
00091     void wait_for_on ()
00092     {
00093 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00094         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00095         if (!_on)
00096             cond.wait(Lock);
00097 
00098 #else
00099         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex), resource_error);
00100         if (!_on)
00101             stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_wait
00102                            (&cond, &mutex), resource_error);
00103 
00104         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex), resource_error);
00105 #endif
00106     }
00107     void wait_for_off ()
00108     {
00109 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00110         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00111         if (_on)
00112             cond.wait(Lock);
00113 
00114 #else
00115         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex), resource_error);
00116         if (_on)
00117             stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_wait
00118                            (&cond, &mutex), resource_error);
00119 
00120         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex), resource_error);
00121 #endif
00122     }
00123     bool is_on ()
00124     {
00125 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00126         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00127         return _on;
00128 #else
00129         bool res;
00130         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex), resource_error);
00131         res = _on;
00132         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex), resource_error);
00133         return res;
00134 #endif
00135     }
00136 };
00137

00139 
00140 #endif
